## In how many ecoregions we can find Ursidae species ?

```{r}
#| label: table_species

ursidae_ecoregions <- ecoregion_per_taxa(taxa = "Ursidae", taxa_level = "family")
knitr::kable(ursidae_ecoregions)

```

```{r}
#| label: plot_species

p <- visualisation_ecoregion_per_taxa(ursidae_ecoregions)
plot(p)

```
